name: 殳國俊
objective:
本課程將討論材料熱力學與動力學之間的差異與擴散理論。課程最後會介紹動力學在工業界的應用實例：金屬熱處理與粉末燒結理論。
This lecture will discuss the differences between Thermodynamics and Kinetics and also discuss the Diffusion Theory. At the end of this lecture, we will introduce the applications of Kinetics in industry cases: Metal Heat Treatment and Theory of Sintering.
materials: Physical Metallurgy Principles, Fourth Edition, Robert E. Reed-Hill
consultation: 老師只要有在辦公室 (材資館 501-3), 隨時給你們問問題或者是寫信問老師也可以 gjshu@mail.ntut.edu.tw
